sen.j: 黒谷真倉トンネル（くろたにまぐらトンネル）は、京都府綾部市と舞鶴市を貫く舞鶴若狭自動車道のトンネル。
sen.e: The Kurotani Magura Tunnel is one of the tunnels of the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, running between Ayabe City and Maizuru City of Kyoto Prefecture.
The Kurotani Magura Tunnel is one of the tunnels of the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, running between Ayabe City and Maizuru City of Kyoto Prefecture.
The Kurotani Magura Tunnel is one of the tunnels of the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, running between Ayabe City and Maizuru City of Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 舞鶴若狭道のなかでは、兵庫県の丹波第一トンネル（2,361m）に続いて2番目に距離が長い。
sen.e: This tunnel is the second longest tunnel among those tunnels of the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, next to the Tanba Daiichi Tunnel (2,361m) located in Hyogo Prefecture.
This tunnel is the second longest tunnel among those tunnels of the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, next to the Tanba Daiichi Tunnel (2,361m) located in Hyogo Prefecture.
This tunnel is the second longest tunnel among those tunnels of the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, next to the Tanba Daiichi Tunnel (2,361m) located in Hyogo Prefecture.

sen.j: 開通時より対面通行（暫定二車線通行）となっている。
sen.e: As originally designed, this tunnel houses two-lane road without a dividing strip. (It is temporary operated in two lanes out of four lanes)
As originally designed, this tunnel houses two-lane road without a dividing strip (it is temporary operated in two lanes out of four lanes.)
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。it 小文字にしました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: As originally designed, this tunnel houses two-lane road without a dividing strip (it is temporary operated in two lanes out of four lanes.)

sen.j: 1991年（平成8年）：舞鶴自動車道の開通に伴い供給開始。
sen.e: 1991: The tunnel began its operation when the Maizuru Expressway was opened to traffic.
sen.cmt: 「供給開始」の意味するところが不明です。舞鶴自動車道開通とありますのでトンネル開通の意味でしょうか。その意味で一応訳しました。なお舞鶴自動車道とありますがこれは開通時の名のようです。2003年に改称され舞鶴若狭自動車道となったようですが説明がありません。そのままで訳しています。（ただし、セル22では過去名称でありながら現在形で説明されています。
sen.e: 1991: The tunnel began its operation when the Maizuru Expressway was opened to traffic.
1991: The tunnel began its operation when the Maizuru Expressway was opened to traffic.
1991: With the start of the construction to expand the Maizuru Expressway from two lanes to four lanes, the alteration of this tunnel also started.
sen.cmt: この説明は「道路」に関する説明で、セル22の説明がここでされるべきものです。追加説明しています。
sen.e: 1991: With the start of the construction to expand the Maizuru Expressway from two lanes to four lanes, the alteration of this tunnel also started.
1991: With the start of the construction to expand the Maizuru Expressway from two lanes to four lanes, the alteration of this tunnel also started.

sen.j: 舞鶴道の四車線化工事により、下りトンネル工事が行われている。
sen.e: The construction of the Kuroya Magura Tunnel for the down line of Maizuru Expressway has started.
The construction of the Kuroya Magura Tunnel for the down line of Maizuru Expressway has started.
The construction of the Kuroya Magura Tunnel for the down line of Maizuru Expressway has started.

sen.j: （現在は予算停止中で工事休止）
sen.e: (the construction came to a halt as the budget of the construction was suspended)
(The construction came to a halt as the budget of the construction was suspended.)
sen.cmt: The大文字にしました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: (The construction came to a halt as the budget of the construction was suspended.)
